ApproveAccessGrant.name: ApproveAccessGrant
ApproveAccessGrant.description: Grants permission to approve a permission request

ApprovePermissionRequest.name: ApprovePermissionRequest
ApprovePermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to approve a permission request

AssumePermissionRole.name: AssumePermissionRole
AssumePermissionRole.description: Grants permission to obtain a set of temporary security credentials for experts which they can use to access buyers' AWS resources

CreatePermissionRequest.name: CreatePermissionRequest
CreatePermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to create a permission request

GetPermissionRequest.name: GetPermissionRequest
GetPermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to get a permission request

ListPermissionRequests.name: ListPermissionRequests
ListPermissionRequests.description: Grants permission to list permission requests

RejectPermissionRequest.name: RejectPermissionRequest
RejectPermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to reject a permission request

RevokePermissionRequest.name: RevokePermissionRequest
RevokePermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to revoke a permission request which was previously approved

WithdrawPermissionRequest.name: WithdrawPermissionRequest
WithdrawPermissionRequest.description: Grants permission to withdraw a permission request that has not been approved or declined
